alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 13 at 7:46PM CST until December 17 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Greene and Pickens Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 110.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 122.1 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
